description:
Sora has to stay home with a cold, and she misses being with everyone at school. But just as she`s thinking of her friends, her friends are thinking of her, too... Also, Mike and the rest of the cats are desperate to find a way to speak with humans!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kaze no Hi to, Nekoneko Part 3
Sick Day and Cat Day Part 3
風邪の日と, ねこねこpart3
